C

com.vmworld - package com.vmworld
 
com.vmworld.constants - package com.vmworld.constants
 
com.vmworld.controller - package com.vmworld.controller
 
com.vmworld.entity - package com.vmworld.entity
 
com.vmworld.repository - package com.vmworld.repository
 
com.vmworld.services - package com.vmworld.services
 
Constants - Class in com.vmworld.constants
Utility class containing constant values used across the banking application.
Defines limits for maximum customers, transactions and minimum balance.
This centralizes configuration for limits and business rules
Constants() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.constants.Constants
 
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class com.vmworld.repository.CustomerRepository
Registers a new customer in the system.
Validates mobile number uniqueness and storage limits.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface com.vmworld.services.CustomerServices
Registers a new customer in the system.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class com.vmworld.services.CustomerServicesImpl
Registers a new customer in the system.
Customer - Class in com.vmworld.entity
Model class representing a banking customer.
Contains personal details and is linked to a single bank account.
Customer() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.entity.Customer
Default constructor initializes the customer with a new account.
Customer(int, String, long, Account) - Constructor for class com.vmworld.entity.Customer
Parameterized constructor for creating a new Customer with predefined values/attributes.
customerIndex - Static variable in class com.vmworld.repository.BankingDatabase
Index tracker indicating the next available position in CUSTOMER_LIST.
Also represents the current number of registered customers.
CustomerRepository - Class in com.vmworld.repository
Repository class responsible for managing customer data operations.
Handles creation, ID generation and duplicate checks
CustomerRepository() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.repository.CustomerRepository
 
CUSTOMERS - Static variable in class com.vmworld.constants.Constants
Maximum number of customers that can be registered in the system
CUSTOMERS_LIST - Static variable in class com.vmworld.repository.BankingDatabase
Fixed-size array storing all registered customers.
This is the central data repository for the application, shared across all classes via static import
CustomerServices - Interface in com.vmworld.services
Service interface defining customer management operations.
Promotes loose coupling and abstraction.
CustomerServicesImpl - Class in com.vmworld.services
Implementation of CustomerService interface.
It acts as the service layer, orchestrating business logic by delegating to the repository.
Delegates persistence tasks to CustomerRepository.
CustomerServicesImpl() - Constructor for class com.vmworld.services.CustomerServicesImpl
Initializes the service with a new repository instance.
